post:
It's a while now AJKservers Technologies is providing excellent server solutions at best possible prices. We're providing high performance Windows Virtual Private Servers with remote desktop enabled. These windows vps servers include 2003 and 2008 windows OS with both 32-BIT and 64-BIT available. They are equipped with quad core processors and RAID10 storage arrays for performance and redundancy. You can rest assured your data is secure and equipped to travel uninterrupted across our network. All these windows virtual private servers come with full administrative access and are available in total three locations which are United Kingdom, Miami Frodia USA and Los Angeles CA USA with no difference in price.


We Accept All Major Credit Cards, Paypal, Alertpay, Moneybookers and Liberty Reserve as payment methods for our VPS and dedicated servers orders.

Although we're UK based company, but we do accept clients from all over the world. If you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact us.


  • Dual Quad Core Xeon Servers
  • 2008, 2003 and MSSQL
  • 99.9 Uptime Guarantee
  • Free Backup Storage within the Windows VPS control Panel.
  • Raid-10 protected hard drives. This means Zero down time in case of hardware failures.
  • Full Administrative Access
  • Remote Desktop Enabled
  • No Contracts and No Setup Fees
  • Upgrade or Downgrade Anytime
  • IPv4 & IPv6 support!
  • 3 SERVER LOCATIONS (USA+UK)

Note: We also offer Linux VPS servers in both US & UK locations. Click to view Linux VPS plans

Q: How long does it take to setup a VPS?
A: We manually review every order before the provision. All of our Virtual Private Server & dedicated servers are set up within 6-24 hours once the first payment has been received, other services may take different time depends on type of service. If you're 1st time ordering service, services setup may take more than 24 hours as you have to be verified 1st time via our billing department before service provision.

Q: What type of server are these VPS hosted on?
A: Quad Core Xeon With Minimum 12 - 32GB RAM

Q. Can I upgrade or downgrade my account?
A. Yes, you may upgrade or downgrade your account anytime you like with just a click from clientarea.

Q. Can I host friends?
A. Yes, you may host your friends.

Q. Are there any hidden costs, or setup fees?
A. No.

Q: Can you help transfer our data?
A: Actually we can do this as long as you have the data in a cPanel or DirectAdmin VPS.
Q: Where are your virtual servers located?
A: Windows VPS are available in our Los Angeles CA USA, Miami Florida, USA and Manchester UK datacenters.
